effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 500,757 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 250,577.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description:
Equip: Dealing damage has a chance to grant you a stack of Deepening Darkness. The Darkness erupts at 5 stacks, dealing 287,417 Shadow damage split among all nearby enemies. Damage increases per target, up to 5. Afterwards, the shadows weigh you down and lower your movement speed by 15% for 5 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 500,757 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 250,577.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 103,924 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 575,564, and grants you up to 9,877 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
